DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Unit of Volume CDISC CDASH Total Volume Administration Unit Terminology Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The unit of the result as originally received or collected for specimen tracking.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._An indication of the type of unit of measure being used to express a volume.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indication of the type of unit of measure being used to express a volume.

Concepts.definition: An indication of the type of unit of measure being used to express a volume.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/1/10 released DEC per direction of model owner as part of caDSR model cleanup activity.

ValueDomain.preferredName: CDISC CDASH Total Volume Administration Unit Terminology Unit of Measure
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A terminology subset of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM) Unit codelist created for Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization (CDASH) Total Volume Administration Unit terminology._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A measure of weight.  A milligram is approximately 450,000 times smaller than a pound and 28,000 times smaller than an ounce.

Concepts.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a gram or 1000 micrograms. One milligram equals approximately 0.015 432 grain or 35.274 x 10E-6 ounce.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A metric unit of mass equal to one millionth of a gram or one thousandth of a milligram.

Concepts.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to one millionth of a gram or one thousandth of a milligram.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A unit of volume equal to one millionth (10E-6) of a cubic meter, one thousandth of a liter, one cubic centimeter, or 0.061023 7 cubic inch. A cubic centimeter is the CGS unit of volume.

Concepts.definition: A unit of volume equal to one millionth (10E-6) of a cubic meter, one thousandth of a liter, one cubic centimeter, or 0.061023 7 cubic inch. A cubic centimeter is the CGS unit of volume.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A terminology subset of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM) Unit codelist created for Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization (CDASH) Total Volume Administration Unit terminology.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

Concepts.definition: A terminology subset of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM) Unit codelist created for Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization (CDASH) Total Volume Administration Unit terminology.
A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.
